resources.string: Old settings menus are not shown
Debug logs do not include proto buffer

"Enabling this setting will log additional layout data, including on-screen text for some UI components.
This can help identify components when creating custom filters.
However, enabling this will also log some user data such as your IP address."
Expandable card under videos is hidden
Expandable card under videos is shown
Floating microphone button in search is hidden
Floating microphone button in search is shown

"Horizontal shelves are hidden, such as:
• Breaking news • Continue watching • Explore more channels • Most relevant • Shopping • Watch it again"
Image shelf in search results is hidden
Image shelf in search results is shown
Show more button in search results is hidden
Show more button in search results is shown
\'People also watched\' and \'You might also like\' labels in search results are hidden
\'People also watched\' and \'You might also like\' labels in search results are shown
YouTube Doodles animation on the logo is hidden
YouTube Doodles animation on the logo is shown

"YouTube Doodles are shown a few days each year.
If a Doodle is currently showing in your region and this hide setting is on, then the filter bar below the search bar will also be hidden."
Quick actions in fullscreen are hidden
Quick actions in fullscreen are shown
Related videos in quick actions are hidden
Related videos in quick actions are shown
AI-generated video summary section is hidden
AI-generated video summary section is shown
Featured places, Games, Music, and People mentioned sections are hidden
Featured places, Games, Music, and People mentioned sections are shown
Explore the podcast section is hidden
Explore the podcast section is shown
How this content was made section is hidden
How this content was made section is shown
Hide or show video description components
Hide or show the filter bar in feeds, related videos, search results, and watch history
Hide or show channel page components
Hide or show comments section components
Comments by members header is hidden
Comments by members header is shown
Create a Short button is hidden
Create a Short button is shown
Emoji and Timestamp buttons are hidden
Emoji and Timestamp buttons are shown
List of component path builder strings to filter separated by new line
View count is hidden in feed and search results
View count is shown in feed and search results
"Limitations: • Shorts shelves, channel pages, and search results may still show view counts • This feature does not work with automotive form factor"
Upload time is hidden in feed and search results
Upload time is shown in feed and search results
"Limitations: • Shorts shelves, channel pages, and search results may still show upload times • This feature does not work with automotive form factor"
Hide feed and search videos using keyword filters
Videos in Home tab are filtered by keywords
Videos in Home tab are not filtered by keywords
Search results are filtered by keywords
Search results are not filtered by keywords
Videos in Subscriptions tab are filtered by keywords
Videos in Subscriptions tab are not filtered by keywords

"Keywords and phrases to hide, separated by new lines
Keywords can be channel names or any text shown in video titles
Words with uppercase letters in the middle must be entered with the casing (ie: iPhone, TikTok, LeBlanc)"

"Home / Subscriptions / Search results are filtered to hide content that matches keyword phrases
Limitations • Shorts cannot be hidden by channel name • Some UI components may not be hidden • Searching for a keyword may show no results"

Surrounding a keyword/phrase with double-quotes will prevent partial matches of video titles and channel names

For example,
\"ai\" will hide the video: How does AI work?
but will not hide: What does fair use mean?
Keyword is too short and requires quotes: %s
Creator store shelf under video player is hidden
Creator store shelf under video player is shown
End screen store banner is hidden
End screen store banner is shown
Shopping links in video description are hidden
Shopping links in video description are shown
View products banner in video overlay is hidden
View products banner in video overlay is shown

"YouTube Premium promotions are hidden
Limitations: YouTube Doodles page is not available"
Copy video URL button is shown. Tap to copy video URL. Tap and hold to copy with timestamp
Copy video URL button is not shown
Copy timestamp URL button is shown. Tap to copy video URL with timestamp. Tap and hold to copy without timestamp
Copy timestamp URL button is not shown
This does not bypass the age restriction. It just accepts it automatically.
Sign in to TV popup is disabled
Sign in to TV popup is enabled
Double tap can never trigger a skip to the next/previous chapter
Double tap can occasionally trigger a skip to the next/previous chapter
Settings for using an external downloader
Download button in player is shown
Download button in player is not shown
Download button opens your external downloader
Download button opens the native in-app downloader
Package name of your installed external downloader app
%s is not installed. Please install it.

"Could not find installed app with package name: %s
Verify the package name is correct and the app is installed"
The package name cannot be empty

"Fullscreen brightness swipe is enabled
Adjust brightness by swiping vertically on the left side of the screen"

"Fullscreen volume swipe is enabled
Adjust volume by swiping vertically on the right side of the screen"
Save and restore brightness when exiting or entering fullscreen
Do not save and restore brightness when exiting or entering fullscreen
Swiping down to the lowest value of the brightness gesture enable auto-brightness
Swiping down to the lowest value does not enable auto-brightness
The amount of milliseconds the overlay is visible
The color of the progress bar for brightness controls
The color of the progress bar for volume controls
The text size for swipe overlay between 1-30
The text size must be between 1-30
The amount of threshold for swipe to occur
How much the volume changes per swipe
Swiping in fullscreen mode will change to the next/previous video
Swiping in fullscreen mode will not change to the next/previous video
Hide or show buttons under videos
Like and Subscribe button will not glow when mentioned
Like and Subscribe button will glow when mentioned
Like and Dislike buttons are hidden
Like and Dislike buttons are shown
This hide function may not work for some user accounts.
Hide or change navigation bar buttons

"Create button is switched with Notifications button
Note: Enabling this also forcibly hides video ads"
Create button is not switched with Notifications button

"Disabling this setting will also disable Shorts ad blocking.
If changing this setting does not take effect, try switching to Incognito mode."
Status bar is opaque or translucent
Light mode navigation bar is opaque
Light mode navigation bar is opaque or translucent
Dark mode navigation bar is opaque
Dark mode navigation bar is opaque or translucent
Hide or show player flyout menu items
Additional settings / More menu is hidden
Additional settings / More menu is shown
Listen with YouTube Music menu is hidden
Listen with YouTube Music menu is shown

"Audio track menu is hidden
To show the Audio track menu, change \'Spoof video streams\' to \'Android No SDK\'"
Watch in VR menu is hidden
Watch in VR menu is shown
Hide or show Shorts player components
Hidden in Home feed and related videos
Shown in Home feed and related videos
Buy Super Thanks button is hidden
Buy Super Thanks button is shown
Use this sound button is hidden
Use this sound button is shown
Use this template button is hidden
Use this template button is shown
Like button fountain animation is hidden
Like button fountain animation is shown

"End screen suggested video is hidden when autoplay is turned off
Autoplay can be changed in YouTube settings: Settings → Playback → Autoplay next video"
End screen suggested video is shown
Related videos overlay in fullscreen is hidden
Related videos overlay in fullscreen is shown
Exit fullscreen mode at end of video
Videos do not open in fullscreen mode
Opacity value between 0-100, where 0 is transparent
Player overlay opacity must be between 0-100
Dislikes are temporarily not available (API timed out)
Dislikes are not available (client API limit)
Reload video to vote using Return YouTube Dislike

"Dislikes on Shorts are shown
Limitation: Dislikes may not appear in incognito mode"
Dislikes on Shorts are not shown
Dislikes are shown as a percentage
Dislikes are shown as a number
Like button styled for minimum width
Like button styled for best appearance
Videos with disabled likes show an estimated likes count
Show a notification if API is not available
Notification is shown if Return YouTube Dislike is not available
Notification is not shown if Return YouTube Dislike is not available
Data is provided by the Return YouTube Dislike API. Tap here to learn more
Return YouTube Dislike API statistics of this device
Dislikes are temporarily not available - Client API rate limit in effect
API fetch votes, number of calls
API fetch votes, number of timeouts
SponsorBlock is a crowdsourced system for skipping annoying parts of YouTube videos
Segment voting button is not shown
Skip button styled for minimum width
Skip button styled for best appearance
Skip button hides after a few seconds
Skip button is shown for the entire segment
How long to show the skip and skip to highlight buttons before automatically hiding
Notification is shown when a segment is automatically skipped. Tap the notification to undo the skip
How long to show the undo skip notification
Video length minus all segments is shown on the seekbar
Create new segment button is shown
Create new segment button is not shown
Number of milliseconds the time adjustment buttons move when creating new segments
Value must be a positive number
Guidelines contain rules and tips for creating new segments
Read the SponsorBlock guidelines before creating new segments
Show a notification if API is not available
Notification is shown if SponsorBlock is not available
Notification is not shown if SponsorBlock is not available
Lets the SponsorBlock leaderboard know how much time is saved. A message is sent to the leaderboard each time a segment is skipped
Skip count tracking is not enabled
Segments shorter than this value (in seconds) will not be shown or skipped
This should be kept private. This is like a password and should not be shared with anyone. If someone has this, they can impersonate you
Private user id must be at least 30 characters long
The address SponsorBlock uses to make calls to the server
Your SponsorBlock JSON configuration that can be imported / exported to Morphe and other SponsorBlock platforms
Your SponsorBlock JSON configuration that can be imported / exported to Morphe and other SponsorBlock platforms. This includes your private user id. Be sure to share this wisely

"Your settings contain a private SponsorBlock userid.
Your user ID is like a password, and it should never be shared."
Paid promotion, paid referrals and direct advertisements. Not for self-promotion or free shout-outs to causes / creators / websites / products they like
Similar to Sponsor except for unpaid / self promotion. Includes sections about merchandise, donations, or information about who they collaborated with
A short reminder to like, subscribe or follow them in the middle of content. If it is long or about something specific, it should instead be under self promotion
The part of the video that most people are looking for
An interval without actual content. Could be a pause, static frame, or repeating animation. Does not include transitions containing information
Credits or when the YouTube endcards appear. Not for conclusions with information
Narrated trailers for the upcoming video, greetings and goodbyes. Does not include sections that add additional content
Collection of clips that show what is coming up or what happened in the video or in other videos of a series, where all information is repeated elsewhere
Tangential scenes or jokes that are not required to understand the main content of the video. Does not include sections providing context or background details
Only for use in music videos. Sections of music videos without music, that aren\'t already covered by another category
Unable to submit segment. Rate Limited (too many from the same user or IP)
SponsorBlock is temporarily not available (API timed out)
Unable to vote for segment (API timed out)
There are no segments to vote for
Category is disabled in settings. Enable category to submit.
Set %s as the start or end of a new segment?

"The segment is from
%1$s to %2$s
(%3$s)
Ready to submit?"
Start must be before the end
Mark two locations on the time bar first
Preview the segment, and ensure it skips smoothly
Do you want to edit the timing for the start or end of the segment?
Stats are temporarily not available (API is down)
Tap here to change your username
Tap here to view your segments
Tap here to see the global stats and top contributors

That\'s %s of their lives.
Tap here to see the leaderboard
Data is provided by the SponsorBlock API. Tap here to learn more and see downloads for other platforms

"Changes include:
Tablet layout • Community posts are hidden
Automotive layout • Shorts open in the regular player • Feed is organized by topics and channels"

"App version will be spoofed to an older version of YouTube.
This will change the appearance and features of the app, but unknown side effects may occur.
If later turned off, it is recommended to clear the app data to prevent UI bugs."
20.13.41 - Restore non collapsed video action bar

"Start page is always changed
Limitation: Using the back button on the toolbar may not work"
Start page is changed only on app startup
Shorts player will not resume on app startup
Shorts player will resume on app startup
Change the style of the in-app minimized player
Enable double-tap and pinch to resize

"Double-tap action and pinch to resize is enabled
• Double tap to increase miniplayer size • Double tap again to restore original size"
Double-tap action and pinch to resize is disabled

"Drag and drop is enabled
Miniplayer can be dragged to any corner of the screen"

"Horizontal drag gesture enabled
Miniplayer can be dragged off-screen to the left or right"

"Buttons are hidden
Swipe to expand or close"
Expand and close buttons are shown
Hide skip forward and back buttons
Skip forward and back are hidden
Skip forward and back are shown
Initial on screen size, in pixels
Pixel size must be between %1$s and %2$s
Opacity value between 0-100, where 0 is transparent
Miniplayer overlay opacity must be between 0-100
Loading screen will have a gradient background
Loading screen will have a solid background
The accent color of the seekbar

"Using original image host
Enabling this can fix missing images that are blocked in some regions"

"DeArrow provides crowdsourced thumbnails for YouTube videos. These thumbnails are often more relevant than those provided by YouTube
If enabled, video URLs will be sent to the API server and no other data is sent. If a video does not have DeArrow thumbnails, then the original or still captures are shown
Tap here to learn more about DeArrow"
Show a notification if API is not available
Notification is shown if DeArrow is not available
Notification is not shown if DeArrow is not available
The URL of the DeArrow thumbnail cache endpoint
Still captures are taken from the beginning / middle / end of each video. These images are built into YouTube and no external API is used
Using medium quality still captures. Thumbnails will load faster, but live streams, unreleased, or very old videos may show blank thumbnails
Video time to take still captures from
DeArrow is temporarily not available (status code: %s)
Announcements on startup are not shown
Loop video button is not shown

"Device dimensions spoofed
Higher video qualities might be unlocked, but you may experience video playback stuttering, worse battery life, and unknown side effects"

"Device dimensions not spoofed
Enabling this can unlock higher video qualities"
Enabling this can cause video playback stuttering, worse battery life, and unknown side effects.
If you recently changed your account login details, then uninstall and reinstall MicroG.
Quality changes apply to all videos
Quality changes only apply to the current video
Show notification on video quality changes
A notification is shown when the default video quality is changed
A notification is not shown when the default video quality is changed
Default video quality on Wi-Fi network
Default video quality on mobile network
Quality changes apply to all Shorts
Quality changes only apply to the current Short
Default Shorts quality on Wi-Fi network
Default Shorts quality on mobile network
Speed dialog button is shown. Tap and hold to reset playback speed to default
Speed dialog button is not shown
Video quality button is shown. Tap and hold to reset quality to default
Video quality button is not shown
Custom speed menu is not shown
Add or change the custom playback speeds
Custom speeds must be less than %s
Playback speed changes apply to all videos
Playback speed changes only apply to the current video
Show notification on playback speed changes
A notification is shown when the default playback speed is changed
A notification is not shown when the default playback speed is changed
Video codec is forced to AVC (H.264)

"Benefits: • Can improve battery life • Can restore missing video resolutions on older device
Limitations: • Maximum resolution is 1080p • Video playback will use more internet data than VP9 or AV1 • HDR videos will not use AVC • Some devices cannot force AVC"
Advanced video quality menu is shown
Advanced video quality menu is not shown
Slide to seek is not enabled

"Video codec is AVC (H.264), VP9, or AV1
Playback may stutter or drop frames"
Video codec is AVC (H.264) or VP9

"Enabling this setting may use software AV1 decoding.
Video playback with AV1 may stutter or drop frames."
• Experimental client and may stop working anytime
• Video may stop at 1:00, or may not be available in some regions
• Kids videos may not play when logged out or in incognito mode
• Force original audio is not available
Client type is shown in Stats for nerds
Client is hidden in Stats for nerds
